query.q: L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_timer_wait`) AS `耗时`) { `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `SQL 数`) { `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_timer_wait`) AS `耗时`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` = re('SELECT*') ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `SQL 总数`) { `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' } BY `schema_name`

charts.name: 单条 SQL 最大执行次数

query.q: L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`count_star`)) { `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_lock_time`) AS `最长锁时间`) { `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' } BY `schema_name`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_timer_wait`) AS `耗时`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`message`) AS `SQL`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_lock_time`) AS `锁时长`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_no_index_used`) AS `无索引`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_no_good_index_used`) AS `使用索引`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_select_scan`) AS `首表扫描数`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`sum_select_full_join`) AS `链表扫描数`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(SUM(`count_star`) AS `累计查询次数`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(LAST(`create_time`) AS `创建时间`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('set*') and `message` != re('show*') ) } BY `digest`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(MAX(`sum_timer_wait`) AS `耗时`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` = re('INSERT*') ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `querys`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `message` = re('SELECT*') and `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `inserts`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `message` = re('INSERT*') and `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' ) } BY `schema_name`
L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `updates`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `message` = re('UPDATE*') and `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' ) } BY `schema_name`

L::`mysql_dbm_metric`:(COUNT(`*`) AS `OTHERS`) { `index` = 'default' and ( `message` != re('UPDATE*') and `server` = '#{server}' and `schema_name` = '#{schema}' and `message` != re('INSERT*') and `message` != re('SELECT*') ) } BY `schema_name`

query.content:
### 慢查询优化

目前有两种方式可以进行优化慢查询操作

1、通过开启**slow log 慢查询日志**，收集慢查询日志，人为对慢查询 SQL 执行 explain。

2、利用观测云 通过 MySQL 开启 `dbm` 采集数据库性能指标，同时会自动选取部分执行耗时较高的 SQL 语句，获取其执行计划，并采集实际执行过程中的各种性能指标。

<font color='red'>当前 dashboard 属于方式2，通过开启 `dbm` 采集数据库性能指标制作当前仪表盘。</font>
